filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going to movie?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?歡迎收聽齊彬老師的超級英語通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hello everyone, welcome to News English All Pass.My name is Kenneth Chee.歡迎收聽新聞英語通,我是齊彬老師。In this unit, we'll be learning about some news.這個單元裡面,我們要來學習的是新聞英語。So first, let's listen to today's news.首先,讓我們來聽一下今天的新聞。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: Let's listen to the news.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: 一開始,先來看一下標題。In the beginning, let's take a look at the title.創記錄的野火氣象報告。The unprecedented fire situation.這個字是一個形容詞,指的是前所未有的。Let's take a quick look at the focus of the news.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: 一開始說了,我們的地區目前正面對的前所未見以及破壞強大的野火事件。Let's take a look at this first.再一次,它就是前所未見的。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: It's characterized by record-setting fire activity.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: 從that到landscapes,這邊是一個relative clause,是關係子句,用來修飾前面的fire activity。Landscape則是自然風景的意思。好,那麼接著下面描述一下這個天氣狀況的細節。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: 他說各種極端天氣狀況的結合,包含了旱災,異常的高溫以及強風,已經為快速而強烈的野火發展創造了環境。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: Exceptionally,這個字是一個副詞,通常的意思是傑出的,這邊指的是異常的。These conditions have resulted in record-breaking wildfires that are challenging to control.這些情況都導致了破紀錄的野火,難以控制。Record-breaking是一個複合形容詞,表示的就是破紀錄的。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: That are challenging to control,這整個是一個relative clause,關係子句,來修飾前面的wildfires。最後再說一些相關的細節。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: Covering thousands of acres of land and releasing massive smoke into the atmosphere.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: Release是一個動詞,就是釋放、放出。Evacuations are underway in numerous areas, and road closures are in effect to protect public safety.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: 就是撤離。Underway,表示的是進行中。In effect,這個片語就是實行中。好,以上就是這篇氣象報導的解說。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: 這個單元我們的文法重點要看的是分詞構句,看一下例句。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: Words and phrases 詞彙片語
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: 名詞毀滅性的、破壞性極大的
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: 和旱災Exceptionally 副詞卓越的、傑出的Temperature 名詞溫度Gusty wind 名詞震風Intense 形容詞強烈的、極度的Record-breaking 形容詞破紀錄的Challenging 形容詞
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: 有挑戰性的、有難度的Cover 動詞蓋上、覆蓋Release 動詞釋放、放開Massive 形容詞巨大的、大量的Underway 形容詞正在進行的、正在發生的Numerous 形容詞
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: 許多的、大量的In effect 片語實際上、事實上OK, that's all for this unit.最後請記得每日十分鐘讓您變成英語通。我是齊斌老師。Until then, see you next time.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: Triple W 點 NER 點 GOV 點 7W
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Record-Setting Wildfire Weather Report_ Unprecedented Fire Conditi.json

chunks.chunk_text: 愛教育電台
